nodes.bodyText: x-wso2-response is not in use anymore. Shall we remove this?

}"

nodes.bodyText: x-wso2-request, x-wso2-response, x-wso2-curl are not in use. Shall we remove them?

nodes.bodyText: Can't we have actual examples here? Does it break any intended behaviors of the doc?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -7870,6 +8236,7 @@ definitions:
         type: array
         items:
           type: string
+        example: []

nodes.bodyText: this field is used when cross tenant subscription is enabled. Since we are deprecating that feature in 3.2.0 left the field as an empty array.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -7870,6 +8236,7 @@ definitions:
         type: array
         items:
           type: string
+        example: []

@@ -7895,17 +8262,17 @@ definitions:
         type: array
         items:
           type: string
-          example: ["Pizzashack, Petstore"]
+        example: []

nodes.bodyText: Gateway labels have to be predefined before attaching to an API, in case we define a non-existent Gateway label in the API payload, that label gets skipped. Hence left the field as empty to avoid confusion.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -7895,17 +8262,17 @@ definitions:
         type: array
         items:
           type: string
-          example: ["Pizzashack, Petstore"]
+        example: []

@@ -8097,13 +8480,14 @@ definitions:

-          example: ["Finance"]
+        example: []

           - apim:api_publish
